name: Shopping Spree (JustOneDev)
description:
Shopping Spree is a simple endless game made by Khalil Zribi where you play as a shopping cart and carry items from boxes into their respective shelves. 

The gameplay is made to be as intuitive as possible, using simple sprites, easy to understand mechanics, and a simple but enjoyable game loop.

Controls:

You can move using the WASD or the Arrow Keys.

You can reset the game using the R button and quit to the main menu using the Escape button

How To Play:

There are three boxes and three shelves. the game indicates which shelf should be refilled, and what box you should refill it from. succefully refilling a shelf will increase your score, and refilling it from a different box will cause failure. Keep in mind that speed increases alongside your score.

Availability:

This game is currently only available for Windows.
